name: Traveler Bird
description:
Use your mouse to control the bird, left click to flap its wings or right click to stop the flight. Avoid the obstacles on your way and try to find the end of your journey.

Every moment you find a new difficulty, but remember not to give up, in the end there will be a reward of great value.

There will be 50 different levels in which the bird will encounter various obstacles that hindered him to reach his final destination.

Each level will have a difficulty progression.
